


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.file -->
<!-- @name    extension -->

# ```js extension ```


Return the passed file path extension

## Parameters

- **path**  String: The file path to get the extension from



## Example (js)

```js
import extension from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/file/extension';
extension('hello/world.jpg'); // => jpg
```
